## EthersSfStablecoin.borrowDebtToken() method

Adjust existing Trove by borrowing more DebtToken.

**Signature:**

```typescript
borrowDebtToken(amount: Decimalish, maxBorrowingRate?: Decimalish, overrides?: EthersTransactionOverrides): Promise<TroveAdjustmentDetails>;
```

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>

amount


</td><td>

[Decimalish](./lib-base.decimalish.md)


</td><td>

The amount of DebtToken to borrow.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

maxBorrowingRate


</td><td>

[Decimalish](./lib-base.decimalish.md)


</td><td>

Maximum acceptable [borrowing rate](./lib-base.fees.borrowingrate.md)<!-- -->.


</td></tr>

overrides


</td><td>

[EthersTransactionOverrides](./lib-ethers.etherstransactionoverrides.md)


</td><td>


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[TroveAdjustmentDetails](./lib-base.troveadjustmentdetails.md)<!-- -->&gt;

## Exceptions

Throws [EthersTransactionFailedError](./lib-ethers.etherstransactionfailederror.md) in case of transaction failure. Throws [EthersTransactionCancelledError](./lib-ethers.etherstransactioncancellederror.md) if the transaction is cancelled or replaced.

## Remarks

Equivalent to:

```typescript
adjustTrove({ borrowDebtToken: amount }, maxBorrowingRate)
```
